fields.text: Welcome to SyncFab in the East Bay, pioneering the digital transformation of the manufacturing supply chain with blockchain technology.
If you would like a new quote or to place a manufacturing order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our quoting department.
To speak with a sales representative, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to sales.
If you need order status or support, press [INDEX].
To check the status of an existing order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to order support.
For technical assistance or troubleshooting, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to technical support.
